summary: The story of two guys and two girls who meet and fall in love in an amusement park on the last day of summer. All the while outwitting three moronic would-be jewel thieves.
cast: Carl Marotte|Thor Bishopric|Carolyn Dunn|Rachel Hayward|Michael Rudder|Pierre-Andre LaRoque|Papusha Demitro|Vlasta Vrana|Beverly Murray|Michele Scarabelli|Jérôme Tiberghien|Bob Pierson|Tiffany Silverman|Lillian Horowitz|Daniel Nalbach|Allan Katz|Suzanne DeLaurentiis|Danny Silverman|Brigitte Boulet|Judith Gault|Derek McKinnon|Babs Gadbois|Aaron Rand|David Sisak|Jaine Marzan|Martine Mayer|Winston Wood|Arthur Grosser|Ceil Gruessing|Lionel Nicolas-Etienne|Rebecca Dewey|Walter Massey|J. Winston Carroll|Gene Mack|Brent Meyer
title: Último día de verano
